page:
OpenMath Workshops
From time to time various meetings are organised by the OpenMath Society and by the various associated OpenMath Projects. This page collects slides and notes from those meetings.
The 25th OpenMath workshop: Bath, 2013.
The 24th OpenMath workshop: Bremen, 2012 (Proceedings).
The 23rd OpenMath workshop: Paris 2010.
The 22nd OpenMath workshop: Grand Bend 2009.
The 21st OpenMath workshop: Linz 2007.
The 7th Thematic Network workshop, Helsinki 2004: ten years of OpenMath.
The 6th Thematic Network workshop, Bremen November 2003.
The 5th Thematic Network workshop, Mathematics On The Semantic Web (Eindhoven) May 2003.
The 4th Thematic Network workshop, Pisa, September 2002.
The 3rd Thematic Network workshop, Nice, March 2002.
The 2nd Thematic Network workshop, Linz, September 2001.
The Thematic Network kick-off meeting, Berlin, August 2001.
The ESPRIT Project held an Information Day in Heidelberg on October 6th 2000.
13th OpenMath workshop, August 10 2000, University of St Andrews.
12th OpenMath workshop, June 14-15 1999, Technical University of Eindhoven.
The ESPRIT Project held a Seminar on OpenMath for Industry on June 11 1999 in Amsterdam.
Matematiikka tietoverkoissa: A workshop held in Helsinki on 26 November 1998.
The ESPRIT Project held its first OpenMath for Industry meeting at the University of St. Andrews, September 15 1998
Details of all the OpenMath Society workshops which took place before 1999 can be found here.
